summary: Metalogic_v2 is confirmed fully independent of Metalogic - no source file imports detected. Four external files import from Metalogic and need migration. Decidability module is unique to Metalogic (not yet in Metalogic_v2). Recommended approach: Move all Metalogic to Boneyard, allow temporary Boneyard imports for Demo.lean until decidability is added to Metalogic_v2.

artifacts.summary: Research report confirming Metalogic_v2 independence and documenting migration plan with 4 phases
